import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Drink } from '../../../models/drink.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-drink', templateUrl: './add-drink.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-drink.component.css'] }) export class AddDrinkComponent implements OnInit { addDrinkRequest: Drink = { id: 0, name: '', description: '', isActive: true, dateCreated: new Date(), type: '' }; }
